title: the new nightly with rust-lld not works on target wasm32-unknown-unknown for crate-type "cdylib"
body:
The new nightly build with `rust-lld` cannot build crate types `cdylib` on `wasm32-unknown-unknown` target.

Error message:
```
error: linking with `rust-lld` failed: signal: 6
  |
  = note: "rust-lld" "-flavor" "wasm" "-L" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/my-programs/Rust/ttt/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/deps/ttt.ttt.67jc2472-cgu.0.rcgu.o" "-o" "/Users/mehdishojaei/my-programs/Rust/ttt/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/deps/ttt.wasm" "/Users/mehdishojaei/my-programs/Rust/ttt/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/deps/ttt.35iq351ahz0t37kd.rcgu.o" "--gc-sections" "-O3" "-L" "/Users/mehdishojaei/my-programs/Rust/ttt/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/deps" "-L" "/Users/mehdishojaei/my-programs/Rust/ttt/target/release/deps" "-L" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/libstd-3bf2746c2f2ee363.rlib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/libpanic_abort-c77bc9628e68b0d7.rlib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/libunwind-50d22357547ee3ba.rlib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/liblibc-d698486c1cb40cfa.rlib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/liballoc_system-7dba69201cc15fca.rlib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/libdlmalloc-82422529020f5084.rlib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/liballoc-e9ca005e3528d110.rlib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/libcore-72cdb87d453c2fb5.rlib" "/Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/wasm32-unknown-unknown/lib/libcompiler_builtins-4d1665f7ea404c85.rlib" "--no-threads" "-z" "stack-size=1048576" "--stack-first" "--allow-undefined" "--no-entry" "--export-table"
  = note: dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libLLVM.dylib
            Referenced from: /Users/mehdishojaei/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/x86_64-apple-darwin/bin/rust-lld
            Reason: image not found


error: aborting due to previous error
```
